text:
League 1
ASSE - Monaco: what time and on which TV channel?
Winner against OM in the Coupe de la Ligue, AS Monaco moves to Geoffroy-Guichard to face Saint-Etienne. A match broadcast live and in full on French television. At what time and on which TV channel? Answer in this article
03 Nov 2019, 04:00 by Charlie Creteur



The Monegasques seem again in confidence! Indeed, the players of Leonardo Jardim remain on 3 consecutive victories in all competitions including the last against Olympique de Marseille (2-0), on the occasion of the sixteenth finals of the Coupe de la Ligue. Augustin opened the scoring in the 25th minute before the goal of Aguilar's break (40th) against impotent Phoceans. A victory that is good before the shock of the 12th day against Saint-Etienne, this Sunday.







ASSE - Monaco live on TV




Claude Puel + 18 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This match of the 12th day of Ligue 1 between AS Saint-Etienne and AS Monaco is broadcast live on television by Canal +. The kickoff will be given at 9 pm French time.
